# Sundarbans is # mangrove forest that is situated to # South of Bangladesh. It is # largest mangrove forest in the world with # area of about 10,000 square kilometres extending over both Bangladesh and India. The Sundarbans is also famous for being # home to # Bengal Tiger, which is # endangered species in the world. One can travel to the Sundarbans from Khulna or Mongla Port by water transports like # launch, speedboat or ship.
